attributes.action: Extend human rights regarding housing to service personnel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Several people have succesfully sued for the right to live in better-quality public housing than that which they were allocated. This right, exercised so far only by refugees against local authorities, should be extended to service personnel living in substandard MoD accommodation. The ministry must no longer be exempt from human rights law when it comes to housing British troops and their families in decent public accommodation.
